content.p: Assistant Professor of Business Economics, Faculty of Social Sciences Dr. Badeeb is an assistant professor in Business Economics at Nottingham University Business School, The University of Nottingham, Malaysia. He received his Ph.D. in Financial Economics from Universiti Sains Malaysia (USM). Previously, he served as the Head of the finance and economics department and senior lecturer at Curtin University Malaysia. He is an experienced researcher in the field of Energy Finance & Economics and Resources Economics. He published several articles in top-tier ranking peer-reviewed journals such as Energy Economics, Resources Policy, and Renewable Energy. He is also a reviewer for many peer-review journals such as Energy Economics, Energy Policy, Resources Policy, and Journal of Cleaner Production. Dr. Badeeb won several Research and teaching excellence Awards and his name appeared in the list of the Top 10% of economics authors in Malaysia according to IDEAS/RePEc. He is also a Fellow of the UK Higher Education Academy (FHEA) and a certified Peer Reviewer of Educational Practice (PREP). Dr. Badeeb has taught various modules of Economics and Finance such as International Finance, Financial Instruments and Markets, Econometrics and Business Economics.
